Articles.Content: Recently, all files from some folders vent missing on my modded install. Those are internals, parts, plugins, resources and sounds. Can anyone help me? (Mods: Hyperedit 1.5.2.1, Kopernicus 1.1.3-1, sigma binary 1.5.5, tarsier space tech 6.4 and module manager 2.6.25)

On 27/08/2016 at 8:32 AM, Alphard said:

Recently, all files from some folders vent missing on my modded install. Those are internals, parts, plugins, resources and sounds. Can anyone help me? (Mods: Hyperedit 1.5.2.1, Kopernicus 1.1.3-1, sigma binary 1.5.5, tarsier space tech 6.4 and module manager 2.6.25)

Hi those folders do not have any content, they are legacy folders left over from the old days of KSP before the GameData folder era combined all the parts under part modules

 

 

Edited August 28, 2016 by SpannerMonkey(smce)

On 28. 8. 2016 at 10:34 PM, SpannerMonkey(smce) said:

Hi those folders do not have any content, they are legacy folders left over from the old days of KSP before the GameData folder era combined all the parts under part modules

 

 

Thanks, I assigned "missing" files with  problem because of mods, fixed now.
